item.title: How to learn Go - A beginner’s guide for beginners
item.description: How to learn Go - A beginner’s guide for beginners The first language that I learned was C when I was in high school. Afterward, I got familiar with Python at the university and kept using it as it was really convenient. After my graduation, I felt the need to learn a strongly typed language, especially with network programming in mind. Therefore, I turned to Go, as a fast, modern language with great features for network programming (also, don’t forget the cute mascot).
